chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

oppY: Y -> Y

Hphi: ring_morphism

Goal:
forall x y : M22 X, morph22 (PL22 pX x y) = PL22 pY (morph22 x) (morph22 y)

Premises:
PL22 : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> M22 R -> M22 R -> M22 R
morph22 = fun X0 : M22 X => let (p, x) := X0 in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (a, b) := p0 in fun c d : X => (〚 a 〛, 〚 b 〛, 〚 c 〛, 〚 d 〛)) x) x : M22 X -> M22 Y
M22 = fun R : Type => (R * R * R * R)%type : Type -> Type Arguments M22 _%type_scope
Record ring_morphism : Prop := mk_ring_morph { morph_z : 〚 zX 〛 = zY; morph_o : 〚 oX 〛 = oY; morph_plus : forall x y : X, 〚 pX x y 〛 = pY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛; morph_mult : forall x y : X, 〚 mX x y 〛 = mY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛; morph_opp : forall x : X, 〚 oppX x 〛 = oppY 〚 x 〛 } Arguments mk_ring_morph _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
mscal : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> nat -> X -> X
Record monoid_theory (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) : Prop := mk_monoid { monoid_unit_l : forall x : X, m u x = x; monoid_unit_r : forall x : X, m x u = x; monoid_assoc : forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z } Arguments monoid_theory [X]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments mk_monoid [X]%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
mscal_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u x : X), mscal m u 0 x = u
mscal_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m x (mscal m u n x)
mscal_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall n : nat, mscal m u n u = u
morph_plus : ring_morphism -> forall x y : X, 〚 pX x y 〛 = pY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛
mk_ring_morph : 〚 zX 〛 = zY -> 〚 oX 〛 = oY -> (forall x y : X, 〚 pX x y 〛 = pY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛) -> (forall x y : X, 〚 mX x y 〛 = mY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛) -> (forall x : X, 〚 oppX x 〛 = oppY 〚 x 〛) -> ring_morphism
M22plus_assoc : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y u : M22 R, PL22 Rplus x (PL22 Rplus y u) = PL22 Rplus (PL22 Rplus x y) u
M22scal_PL22 : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (k : R) (x y : M22 R), M22scal Rmult k (PL22 Rplus x y) = PL22 Rplus (M22scal Rmult k x) (M22scal Rmult k y)
M22_mult_distr_r : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y u : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult (PL22 Rplus y u) x = PL22 Rplus (MU22 Rplus Rmult y x) (MU22 Rplus Rmult u x)
M22_mult_distr_l : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y u : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult x (PL22 Rplus y u) = PL22 Rplus (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y) (MU22 Rplus Rmult x u)
M22plus_comm : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y : M22 R, PL22 Rplus x y = PL22 Rplus y x
M22minus : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, PL22 Rplus x (MI22 Ropp x) = ZE_22 Rzero
Pos.min_mono : forall f : positive -> positive, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Pos.le Pos.le) f -> forall x y : positive, Pos.min (f x) (f y) = f (Pos.min x y)
M22_opp_mult_l : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult (MI22 Ropp x) y = MI22 Ropp (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y)
Pos.min_monotone : forall f : positive -> positive, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Pos.le Pos.le) f -> forall x y : positive, Pos.min (f x) (f y) = f (Pos.min x y)

M22scal_MU22_l : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (k : R) (x y : M22 R), M22scal Rmult k (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y) = MU22 Rplus Rmult (M22scal Rmult k x) y

M22scal_MU22_r : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (k : R) (x y : M22 R), M22scal Rmult k (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y) = MU22 Rplus Rmult x (M22scal Rmult k y)
M22mult_assoc : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x y u : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult x (MU22 Rplus Rmult y u) = MU22 Rplus Rmult (MU22 Rplus Rmult x y) u
IDmorph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> forall reqb : R -> R -> bool, (forall x y : R, reqb x y = true -> req x y) -> ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp reqb (IDphi (R:=R))
mscal_M22scal : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (n : nat) (x : M22 R), mscal (PL22 Rplus) (ZE_22 Rzero) n x = M22scal Rmult (mscal Rplus Rzero n Rone) x
morph_mult : ring_morphism -> forall x y : X, 〚 mX x y 〛 = mY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛
Record ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_rt { Radd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; Radd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); Rdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x...
M22plus_zero : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall m : M22 R, PL22 Rplus (ZE_22 Rzero) m = m
ssrfun.canRL : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT) (x : aT) (y : rT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> f x = y -> x = g y
M22scal_mult : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (k1 k2 : R) (x : M22 R), M22scal Rmult k1 (M22scal Rmult k2 x) = M22scal Rmult (Rmult k1 k2) x

M22mult_one_r : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, MU22 Rplus Rmult x (ID_22 Rzero Rone) = x
M22scal_zero : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall x : M22 R, M22scal Rmult Rzero x = ZE_22 Rzero

intros x y.
unfold morph22.
rewrite 2!PL22_def.
rewrite !morph_mult.
rewrite !morph_plus.
reflexivity.
